title: Jeff Glucker (Hooniverse)
description: As Matt prepares for his ski trip to reenact the tropes of every shoddily made 1980s teen ski dramas my co-host on Hooniverse and long time friend Jeff Glucker joins us for a little catch up session with Matt.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: As Matt prepares for his ski trip to reenact the tropes of every shoddily made 1980s teen ski dramas my co-host on Hooniverse and long time friend Jeff Glucker joins us for a little catch up session with Matt.
